detectors.description:
Deprecated standard detected secretNumber = uint8(sha3()(now,block.blockhash(block.number - 1))) % 20 + 1 (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/other/crypto_roulette.sol#34):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
detectors.markdown:
Deprecated standard detected [secretNumber = uint8(sha3()(now,block.blockhash(block.number - 1))) % 20 + 1](../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/other/crypto_roulette.sol#L34):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

detectors.description:

	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2

	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ABIEncoderV2PackedStorage_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- EventStructWrongData
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder.

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in CryptoRoulette.play(uint256) (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/other/crypto_roulette.sol#37-52):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/other/crypto_roulette.sol#47)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastPlayed = now (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/other/crypto_roulette.sol#51)
	- shuffle() (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/other/crypto_roulette.sol#50)
		- secretNumber = uint8(sha3()(now,block.blockhash(block.number - 1))) % 20 + 1 (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/other/crypto_roulette.sol#34)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [CryptoRoulette.play(uint256)](../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/other/crypto_roulette.sol#L37-L52):
	External calls:
	- [msg.sender.transfer(this.balance)](../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/other/crypto_roulette.sol#L47)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [lastPlayed = now](../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/other/crypto_roulette.sol#L51)
	- [shuffle()](../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/other/crypto_roulette.sol#L50)
		- [secretNumber = uint8(sha3()(now,block.blockhash(block.number - 1))) % 20 + 1](../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/other/crypto_roulette.sol#L34)
